snippet: A preliminary investigation into a blast that killed at least one person and hurt 13 others indicated that it may be linked to a stove disconnected from a gas line.
abstract: Investigators sift through wreckage of building that exploded in Borough Park neighborhood of Brooklyn in search of remains of missing woman Francisca Figueroa and clues as to what caused blast; explosion killed Ligia Puello and injured two witnesses; authorities suggest stove disconnected by gas line may be to blame.

byline.original: By ASHLEY SOUTHALL and REBECCA WHITE

lead_paragraph: A preliminary investigation into a blast that killed at least one person and hurt 13 others indicated that it may be linked to a stove disconnected from a gas line.

headline.main: Crews Seek Missing Woman and Cause After Brooklyn Explosion
headline.print_headline: Crews Seek Missing Woman and Cause After Fatal Blast
